course.subject: IEDA
course.name: Computing in Industrial Applications
course.description: Introduction to microprocessor technologies and computer hardware with industrial applications. Computer systems for industrial control. Digital communication, mobile computing and RFID technology.

reviews.author: soy
reviews.title: Richard SO 幾好grade 教得5錯,易攞B但攞A唔易
reviews.comment_content:
Very interesting automation, pneumatic system. Only basic circuit connecting skills are needed to finish the lab (connecting the power supply, light bulbs, sensors, PLC and valves).
非常有趣的自動化，氣動系統。 只需要基本的電路連接技術即可完成實驗(連接電源，燈泡，傳感器，PLC和閥門)。
by google translate
reviews.comment_teaching:
SO, Richard Hau Yue covers most of the details on the course and are willing to stay behind and answer all your question after class. However, you will have to study hard, do research and answer the questions in the lecture notes in order to get a good grade.
因此，Richard Hau Yue涵蓋了課程的大部分細節，並願意留下來，在課後回答你的所有問題。 但是，你必須努力學習，做研究並回答講義中的問題才能獲得好成績。
by google translate
reviews.comment_grading:
Finish the lab before a specific time and answer the questions in class to ensure the participation marks. After that, you can easily get a B grade with basic understanding of the lecture notes as the midterm and final exam are open-book exam. However, full understanding and extra effort is needed (to do research and answer the questions in the lecture notes) to get an A grade.
在特定時間之前完成實驗，並在課堂上回答問題以確保參與標記。 之後，您可以輕鬆獲得B級，並對課程筆記有基本的了解，因為期中考試和期末考試都是開卷考試。 但是，需要充分理解和額外的努力（進行研究並回答講義中的問題）才能獲得A級。
by google translate
reviews.comment_workload:
You will have to attend every lab session. 2 or 3 very easy HW (you may just search the answer in google) will be given in total. 2 open-book exams in total.
您必須參加每個實驗課程。 2或3個非常簡單的硬件（你可能只是在谷歌搜索答案）將被給予總計。 共2次開卷考試。
by google translate
